content: I've been thinking about doing a yoga teacher training program in the future. I've heard it's a great way to deepen my practice and share my passion for yoga with others. I've already started taking yoga classes regularly, about 6 weeks ago, and I'm really enjoying it. I've tried out a few different styles, like Hatha, Vinyasa flow, and Restorative yoga, and I'm looking to mix it up a bit more. Do you have any suggestions on how I can prepare for a yoga teacher training program?
